Using: An introduction to the metabolomicsR

https://xikunhan.github.io/metabolomicsR/docs/articles/Introduction.html


remotes::install_github("XikunHan/metabolomicsR")

```{r}


# Package names
packages <- c("ggstatsplot","hrbrthemes")

# Install packages not yet installed
installed_packages <- packages %in% rownames(installed.packages())
if (any(installed_packages == FALSE)) {
  BiocManager::install(packages[!installed_packages])
}

# Packages loading
invisible(lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE))
```



```{r}

A=load_excel("Transposed.xlsx", data_sheet = 1, feature_sheet=2, sample_sheet = 3, sampleID = "samplename",featureID = "BIOCHEMICAL")



p=plot_Metabolite(A, plot="boxplot", x="Genotype", color="Time")
            
             
pdf("some_metabolites.pdf")
print(p)
dev.off()
         

```
